vote.text: Amendment SA 3332 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3332 proposed by Senator Durbin to the amendment to H.R. 4310. (consideration: CR S7793-7794; text: CR S7793-7794) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3332 proposed by Senator Durbin to the amendment to H.R. 4310.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3332 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
